entry.tran: （种植酿酒葡萄的）葡萄园;葡萄酒厂
entry.def: A vineyard is an area of land where grape vines are grown in order to produce wine. You can also use vineyard to refer to the set of buildings in which the wine is produced.

means.word_mean: 1. a farm of grapevines where wine grapes are produced
